name: SIRENS
description:
A open world horror game based around the popular mythos created by Trevor Henderson, with some adjustments to the lore.

You are a wanderer who has found himself in the wrong place at the wrong time. You must outsmart SirenHead by collecting several spotlight pieces hidden throughout the map to expose him to enough light to stop him in his tracks.

There are several notes hidden throughout the game that flesh out the lore a little more. 

No spoilers,  a lot of this is meant to be figured out by yourself ;)
